pin_updated_successfully: PIN(namba za siri) yako imefanikiwa kubadilishwa
set_wallet_name_text: Near Mobile Wallet has been created prioritizing the security of your assets. Please read the following security tips carefully to keep your funds safe and follow the recommended steps.
Pochi ya Near ya Simu imetengenezwa ikizingatia usalama wa mali zako kwanza. Tafadhali soma maelezo yafuatayo kwa umakini ili kuweka mali zako salama na fuata hatua zilizopendekezwa.
advise1_title: Near Mobile Wallet is a non-custodial wallet
Pochi ya Near ya Simu ipo chini ya ulezi wako tu.
advise1_text: Near Mobile Wallet is a non-custodial wallet, this means that your assets are in the NEAR network, not in Near Mobile Wallet. Only you can access your private key whether it is generated by Near Mobile Wallet or imported from another wallet. Therefore, the Near Mobile Wallet team cannot recover your account if you make a mistake or lose your private keys and we cannot reverse your transactions if you make a mistake as they are irreversible.

Pochi ya Near ya simu ipo chini ya ulezi wako tu, hii inamaanisha kwamba mali zako zipo kwenye mtandao wa Near, sio kwenye Pochi yako ya simu ya Near. Ni wewe mwenye uwezo wa kupata ufunguo wa siri iwe umetengeneza na pochi ya simu au imeingizwa kutoka kwenye pochi nyingine. Kwaio, timu ya pochi ya simu ya Near haiwezi kuingia kwenye account yako kama ukifanya makosa au kupoteza ufunguo wako wa siri na haiwezi kurudisha miamala kama ukikosea kwani miamala hairudishiki
advise2_text: Near Mobile Wallet is just a client application. This means that your NEAR and other assets are not found in the application, but in the NEAR network. Only you with your private key can access the funds and only you are responsible for keeping it safe and offline. Write several copies of your mnemonic on a piece of paper and store it in different physical locations.

Pochi ya simu ya near ni programu tu ya mteja. Hii inamaanisha NEAR yako na mali nyingine hazipatikani kwenye programu, bali kwenye mtandao wa NEAR. Ni wewe tu mwenye ufunguo wa siri mwenye uwezo wa kupata mali zako na una jukumu ya kuzilinda na kuziweka nje ya mtandao. Andika nakala kadhaa za maneno yako ya siri(mnemonic) kwenye karatasi na hifadhi sehemu tofauti.
advise3_title: Kamwe usimshirikishe mtu maneno yako ya siri(mnemonic)
advise3_text: When you change your phone you will have to re-import your mnemonics to access your accounts. No one from Near Mobile Wallet or NEAR will ever ask you for your private keys or mnemonics. If someone asks you or tells you to enter these keys somewhere else, you are being scammed.

Ukibadili simu yako itabidi uingize maneno ya siri(mnemonic) tena ili kupata akaunti zako. Hakuna mtu yeyote kutoka kwenye timu ya pochi ya Near au NEAR atakuja kukuomba ufunguo wako wa siri(private keys) au maneno ya siri(mnemonic). Kamamtu akikuomba au kukuambia uziingize funguo hizi sehemu, wanataka kukulaghai
receive_info: Send NEAR, tokens or nfts into this account to receive them in your wallet. You can copy the account or scan the QR code to get the account easily.
Tuma NEAR, tokeni au nft kwenye akaunti hii uli kuzipokea kwenye pochi yako. Unaweza kunakili akaunti au skani QR kodi kupata akaunti kiurahisi
mnemonic_input_text: Type a word and press space or enter to add it or tap one to remove it.
Chapisha neno halafu bonyeza space au enter kuliongeza au bonyeza moja kuliondoa.
send_confirmation_text:
Careful, transactions cannot be undone.
Take your time to verify the information.

Kuwa makini miamala haiwezi kubadiliks.
 Chukua muda kuhakiki taarifa.
deposit_summary_warning: Deposit may take a while to be locked and completly functional. You'll be able to follow the process in the Deposit list
Amana zinaweza kuchukua muda kufungwa na kuwa rasmi. Utaweza kufuata hatua zilizopo kwenye orodha ya amana.
delete_data_text: Are you sure you want to delete all the data from this device? You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
Je una uhakika unataka kufuta data zote kwenye hiki kifaa. Utaombwa PIN yako kufanya hivyo.
backup_wallet_advise_text: If you continue you will see your recovery phrase or private key for each of your accounts. If your device is lost or stolen, you will only be able to recover your funds with this recovery phrase or the keys for each account.
Ukiendelea utaona maneno au ufungu wako wa siri wa kila akaunti zako.Kama kifaa chako imeibiwa au imepotea, utaweza tu kupata mafao yako kutumia maneno au ufunguo huu kwa kila akauti.
backup_wallet_advise_text_2: Remember that the accounts tagged as imported can only be retrieved with the private key corresponding to that account.
Kumbuka kwamba akaunti zinazooneka zimeingizwa zinaweza tu kupatikana au kurejeshwa kwa ufunguo wa siri unaoendana na akaunti hio.
not_enough_balance_for_fees: Not enough balance to pay the fees
delete_wallet_text: Are you sure you want to delete  from this device? You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
Una uhakika unataka kufuta {{walletName}} kwenye hiki kifaa? Utaulizwa PIN yako kwa mpangilio kufanya hivyo.
delete_only_wallet_text: Are you sure you want to delete {{walletName}} from this device? This will also erase your other data, as {{walletName}} is your only wallet. You'll be asked for your PIN in order to do so.
Una uhakika unataka kufuta {{walletName}} kwenye hiki kifaa? Hii itafuta na data zako nyingine, kwani {{walletName}} ndio pochi yako pekee. Utaulizwa PIN yako ili iweze kufanya hivyo.
too_many_decimals: Lazima iwe na {{decimals}} au desimali chache
no_deposits: You do not have any deposits in progress
testnet_warning: This is a Testnet version. Do not send Mainnet NEAR to this account.
Hili ni toleo la mtandao wa majaribio(testnet). Usitume NEAR ya mtandao mkuu(mainnet) kwenye akaunti hii.
pending_transaction_text: You have an uncommitted transaction. Please, wait until it is committed to send a new one.
Huu muamala haujapitishwa. Tafadhali subiri upitishwe ili utume mwingine.
add_a_wallet_txt: You can add an account by importing a private key or a mnemonic. You can also create a new account from scratch.
Unaweza ukaongeza akaunti kwa kuingiza ufunguo(private key) au maneno ya siri(mnemonic). Pia unaweza ukatengeneza akaunti mpya.
welcome_to_near_mobile: Karibu kwenye pochi ya NEAR ya simu
import_warning_txt: Important information about importing your account. Remember to keep your private key and/or mnemonic in a safe place.
Ujumbe muhimu kuhusu kuingiza akaunti yako. Kumbuka kutunza ufunguo wa siri na/au maneno ya siri(mnemonic) kwenye sehemu salama.
add_custom_address_warning: Add a custom address account and use it instead of the not so human friendly default address. It will be easier for you and your contacts to remember and share.
Ongeza anuani binafsi na uitumie hiyo badala ya msingi ambayo sio rafiki kwa binadamu. Itafanya urahisi kwako na kwa mikaba yako kukumbuka na kutuma kwa wengine.
allowed_separators_chars: Characters (_-.) can be used as separators
near_account_max_chars: More than 59 characters (64 is the limit counting '.near')
select_funding_acc_explanation_1: You need to fund it with
select_funding_acc_explanation_2: You can fund it with an existing account.
create_account_success: You can now use your new account
Sasa Unaweza kutumia akaunti yako mpya
unstake_your_near: ONDOA NEAR ZAKO KWENYE MFUMO WA HISA
enter_amount_want_to: Enter the amount you want to {{action}}
Ingiza kiasi unachotaka kutumia kwa ajili ya {{action}}
enter_a_validator_account_id: Ingiza ID ya akaunti ya mhalalishaji
enter_new_validator: Enter a new validator or select one from the list to stake your NEAR.
Ingiza mhalalishaji mpya au chagua mmoja kutoka kwenye orodha wa kuwekeza NEAR yako.
select_unstake_validator: Select the validator from which you want to unstake your NEAR.
Chagua mhalalishaji unaetaka uondoe hisa zako za NEAR.
stake_success: Your stake has been succesfully delegated to the validator.
Nguvu ya hisa yako imefanikiwa kuelekezwa kwa mhalalishaji.
unstake_success: has successfully been unstaked from this validator.
amefanikiwa kuondoa hisa zake kutoka kwa mhalalishaji huyu.
unstake_withdraw_waiting_time: Your tokens are pending release and will be made available within 52-65h (4 epochs).
Tokeni zako zinasubiri kuruhuswiwa, zitakuwa zimeruhusiwa baada ya masaa 52-65 (epochi 4).
select_validator_withdrawal: Select the validator pool from whhich you wish to withdraw your tokens.
Chagua pool la mhalalishaji unaetaka utoe tokeni zako.
start_receiving_nfts: To start seeing NFTs, send NFTs to your account's address.
Kuanza kuona nifiti, tuma nifiti kwenye anuani ya akaunti yako
start_receiving_tokens: To start seeing tokens, send tokens to your account's address.
Kuanza kuona tokeni, tuma tokeni kwenye anuani ya akaunti yako
start_making_transactions: To start using NEAR Mobile, send NEARs, tokens or NFTs to your account's address and unleash the power of NEAR.
Kuanza kutumia pochi ya NEAR, tuma NEAR, tokeni au nifiti kwenye anuani ya akaunti yako na achilia nguvu ya NEAR
shareYourNearAddressMessage:
This is my address in the NEAR network using the NEAR Mobile wallet:

{{address}}.

Hii ni anuani yangu kwenye mtandao wa NEAR kutumia pochi ya simu ya NEAR:

{{address}}.
cryptoWithFiatPurchaseCompletedMessage: Remember that it will take a few minutes for your account balance to reflect the new amount.
Kumbuka kwamba itachukua dakika chache hadi kiasi cha akaunti yako kuonyesha kiasi kipya.
shareTxText: Check the transaction I just made in the NEAR network using the NEAR Mobile wallet in the block explorer: {{link}}
Angalia muamala nilioufanya kutumia mtandao wa NEAR kwenye pochi ya simu ya NEAR
signMessageDescription: The dApp {{receiver}} is requesting you to sign the following message:
{{receiver}} ya dapp inataka usaini ujumbe ufuatao:
confirmConnectionWithDescription: Once connected, {{name}} will have the following permissions:
deleteKeyConfirmation: Are your sure you want to remove access keys from {{name}}?
Je unataka kuondoa funguo za vibali kutoka kwa {{name}}?
deployContractDescription: By approving this request, the compiled smart contract will be deployed.
Kwa kuthibitisha ombi hili, mkataba janja uliokusanywa utatekelezwa.
transferActionDescription: By approving this request, you are accepting to send the following amount of NEAR to {{receiverId}}.
Kwa kuthibitisha ombi hili, unakubali kutuma kiasi kifutacho cha NEAR kwa {{receiverId}}.
confirmDisconnectDescription: By approving this request, the following access key will be deleted from your account.
Kwa kuthibitisha ombi hili, funguo za vibali zifuatazo zitafutwa kutoka kwenye akaunti yako.
stakeActionDescription: By approving this request, you will be able to staking your NEAR tokens on your behalf.
Kwa kuthibitisha ombi hili, utaweza kuwekeza tokeni za NEAR kwa niaba yako.
noDApps: There are no dApps to list
noDAppsDescription: Seems like there are no dApps currently available. Please, try again later.
Inavyoonekana hakuna dApps zilizopo hewani kwa sasa. Tafadhali jaribu baadae.
viewAddressPermission: View the address of your permitted account
Angalia anuani ya akaunti yako yenye ruhusa
viewBalancePermission: View the balance of your permitted account
Angalia salio ya akaunti yako yenye ruhusa
callMethodsPermission: Call methods on the smart contract on behalf of your permitted account
Ita kitendo kwenye mkataba janja kwa niaba ya akaunti yako ilioruhusiwa
notTransferTokensPermission: Does not allow the app to transfer tokens
networkFeeAllowanceDescription: The application will be given permission to spend up to {{amount}} towards network fees incurred during use.
Programu hii itapewa ruhusa ya kutumia hadi {{amount}} kwa ajili ya ada ya mtandao itayojitokeza wakati wa matumizi.
callSmartContractDescription: By approving this request, {{contract}} will make the following call.
Kwa kuthibitisha ombi hili, {{contract}} ataita njia ifuatayo
disconnectDApp: To confirm that you want to disconnect the dApp, please press the Disconnect button again.
Kuhakikisha kwamba unataka kukata muunganisho na dapp, bonyeza kitufe cha kukata tena.
signerChangeAccount: You cannot sign this request with the selected account because it is not activated. Please, select another account.
Huwezi kusaini ombi hili na akaunti iliochaguliwa kwa sababu haijafunguliwa, Tafadhali chagua akaunti nyingine.
